jvtool_main module¶

jvtool_main.main()[source]¶
jvtool_main.save_device_parameters(device, overwrite)[source]¶

Saves this device’s parameters in a file named device_name.txt

Parameters:
  • device (Device object) – the current device being saved
  • overwrite (bool) – true if overwrite of device charfile desired, false otherwise
jvtool_main.save_plot(device, overwrite, bounds)[source]¶

Saves JV plots for each Pixel in this Device

Parameters:
  • device (Device object) – the current device being considered
  • bounds (tuple) – tuple of (min_x, max_x, min_y, max_y) bounds for plotting
  • overwrite (bool) – true if overwrite of device charfile is desired, false otherwise
